p: The three workshops were carried out in June 2014, plus an open seminar developed in September 2014, where results were presented. The data analysis included a thematic analysis of resilience definitions (Boyatzis 1998), through a deconstruction of definitions given by participants in the first instrument, and a descriptive statistic of frequency (Mackey and Gass 2015), allowing us to rank occurrences of each response.
